title: MD
biography: Atul Kumar Goel is an Indian businessman. He was the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of Punjab National Bank. He is a former Chief Executive Officer and Managing Director of UCO bank. He has also worked in Allahabad Bank.
aiSummary: Atul Goel is a neurosurgery - craniovertebral surgery specialist with an H-index of 110 at KEM Hospital (Faculty). Has been published in Journal of Clinical Neuroscience. Based in India.
